name: django-unfold-extra
description: Enhancing Django Unfold to support additional packages

scripts.update:unfold-deps: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/unfoldadmin/django-unfold/main/package.json | jq -r '["tailwindcss@" + .dependencies.tailwindcss, "@tailwindcss/typography@" + .devDependencies["@tailwindcss/typography"]] | join(" ")' | xargs npm install --save-dev
scripts.update:unfold: npm run update:unfold-deps && npm run update:unfold-css
